getResource

public HttpConnection getResource(RequestedResource resource,
                                  BrowserContent referrer)
See Also:
Purpose: Retrieve page resources such as images (asyncronously if possible) This method must return a non-null HTTP connection when the referrer is null. This call can be non-blocking if referrer is not null. If the call is not blocking, referrer must be notified with the connection via referrer.resourceReady(HttpConnection) call. Requested resource objects get passed into a rendering application when the rendering session needs assistance in rendering an off-page resource (e.g. an image)
